Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer

Class BalancerRegionLoad

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer.BalancerRegionLoad
@Private @Evolving class BalancerRegionLoad extends Object
Wrapper class for the few fields required by the StochasticLoadBalancer from the full RegionMetrics.
